text: Focus on paid content and video content. Pinterest have strangled content reach since they started trading publicly and are moving towards the above .

elements.text: Focus on paid content and video content. Pinterest have strangled content reach since they started trading publicly and are moving towards the above .

text: I used pinterest at my last job, where I was director of brand & content for a DTC footwear company. Pinterest is fantastic for discover - it’s a great way to introduce your products to new audiences. I found that authentic feeling lifestyle photography performed well and it drove a lot of traffic to our site. The great thing about Pinterest is that you can get some great value of out of it for very little time investment on the organic side. Put up a bunch of pins and wait and see which ones catch fire. A couple trending pins can be a big growth driver for e-commerce brands, especially in fashion.
